name: The Refillable Serum with  TFC8
about: What it is:A hydrating, fast-absorbing concentrate that targets persistent skin challenges like dehydration, stress, signs of aging, and loss of elasticity..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Highlighted Ingredients:- TFC8: Nourishes and protects skin, supporting cellular renewal..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Powered by TFC8u2014a proprietary blend of amino acids, high-grade vitamins, and synthesized molecules that provide key nutrients to the skin and support the bodyu2019s innate renewal processesu2014this serum is designed to be combined with Augustinus Bader face moisturizers for unprecedented visible results..Clinical Results:In clinical trials with 30 female participants (ages 18 to 70), over 12 weeks:
ingredients: -TFC8: Nourishes and protects skin, supporting cellular renewal..-Vitamin C: Supports collagen production for visibly firmer, more resilient skin..-Polysaccharide Moisture Complex: Actively prevents water loss, leaving skin feeling fresh, supple, and soft....Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cellulose, Ethylhexyl Polyhydroxystearate, Resveratrol, Squalane, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Maltitol, Leontopodium Alpinum Callus Culture Extract, Xylitylglucoside, Lecithin, Anhydroxylitol, Citric Acid, Xylitol, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Maltodextrin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, O-Cymen-5-Ol, Punica Granatum Extract, Sodium Phytate, Glucose, Xanthan Gum, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Alanyl Glutamine, Arginine, Oligopeptide-177, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Chloride, Phenylalanine, Sisymbrium Irio Seed Oil.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply twice a day to clean, dry skin (before your moisturizer).  .-Smooth over your face, neck, and decollete in upward-sweeping motions..-Follow with the rest of your Augustinus Bader routine (sold separately). ..Recycling Instructions:.-Recycle or refill container. .-Recycle or compost carton.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Reading the bad reviews and Iu2019m surprised. Iu2019m a cult follower of u201cthe creamu201d perfect for my combo/acne prone skin. BUT when I got a sample of this juice, WOW! firms and brightens instantly. More so if applied at night as a mask. Trully amazing and immediate results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A nice smoothing serum but definitely not worth the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019d be curious to know how many people re-purchase thisu2026 I was excited to get it, but after making my way through 30ml, the only change I noticed was that I got two angry red pimples on my cheeks, which is extremely rare for me. I canu2019t say definitively that this product caused the pimples, but it certainly didnu2019t prevent them or get rid of them quickly, and it had no other noticeable results. At this price, I have no plans to give it more time. Texture is nice ($50 nice, not $500 nice), and packaging is beautiful. Not for me.

reviews.review_title: so good but too expensive unfortunately!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so sad because i received this as a Rouge member in the Bazar rewards section. and wow it is so nice my face literally looked younger and tighter and I noticed my pores looked minimized after afew uses. I really want this serum but the price is what's stopping me from purchasing it. please come out with a smaller size or please lower the prices abit to fit the real world people. such an amazing product should be utilized and enjoyed by everyone! other than that thank you Augustinus bader for allowing me to try this in the Bazar rewards!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very very nice product. Works exactly as described and loved the hydrating and smoothing effect. The only downside, of course, would be the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the reward version of this product and it smells like crayons. It didnu2019t do much and I was concerned about what is in it due to the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is great. However, it is ungodly expensive, and you canu2019t help but associate the steep price tag with the irritatingly excessive and unnecessary packaging/stand. Just package it like the creams. In a normal bottle. They can stand alone on a counter without the help of a giant stand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I saw this was available as a 100 point BI perk, so I decided to give it a shot. My skin is decently sensitive, so I patch test all new skincare on the inside of my arm (which is less sensitive than my face, but a good first step test) before I use it. After a few days of use, I developed a few red, irritated patches where I was testing it. If you have sensitive skin or skin allergies, Iu2019d highly suggest getting a sample first given how expensive it is. My skin is a little raw and stinging now, but at least itu2019s not on my face!

reviews.review_title: Great but I am really turned off by the packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A wonderful serum! Sadly I will not buy this amazing serum and most of it has to do with the wasteful packaging. To advertise sustainably sources resources, but to more than double the amount of landfill packaging, I sadly must say no. You don't need to have a superfluous amount of packaging to sell... It's a turn off :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a 7ml bazaar sample and this serum made my 34 year old skin feel 29 again within 2 weeks. Had to purchase the full size. I am weary of overpriced labels but this just works. Instead of separate vitamin c, peptide & hylaronic acid serums, I only use this AB serum and my Kiehls moisturizer after cleansing. My skin is the happiest itu2019s been in years! Would recommend to anyone in their 30s trying to slow first signs of aging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I been using it for now only a week and half and itu2019s done wonders. My skin is soft and radiates. I would recommend. Price wise I can definitely see the concern. But it works.  awriting  my onlyhad

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing results. I got a couple of small sample sizes with the beauty reward points and itu2019s seriously hard to describe how much of an impact it has on my skin. My forehead wrinkle is gone and can see my skin tighten all around even my neck. Itu2019s sooo expensive but due to the significant results I will be purchasing the full size now. Exactly what Iu2019ve been hoping for to get some elasticity back and just all around soft looking glowing skin itu2019s a close as a miracle in a bottle as you can get and I would hope so with the price tag. Would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Softened my skin immediately and absorbed quickly. I dotted a tiny amount to each quadrant of my face with my fingers so it wasnu2019t absorbed by my palms. Iu2019d have probably not tried it unless it was available as a bazaar itemu2014will definitely splurge on this when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells horrible. Feels kind of slimy to me but absolutely absorbs well and scent disappears afterwards. Does help skin barrier but that smell is very chemically smelling. Gross.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Augustinus Bader product and use a lot of them but this on was not worth the money. I found nothing special about it.

reviews.review_title: Love this serum for a couple times a week
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my goodness serum is amazing. It melted into my skin, my skin drank it up! I only use it before bed just a couple time a week to conserve due to the price and only after I exfoliate with Dr. Barbara Strum enzyme powder cleanser (you can get a cheaper alternative with same formulation on Amazon - Dr. Babor to try before u splurge) This serum is gold for me. I always rub on my neck and chest any left overs on the backs of my hands. Gotta spread the love with skin care.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay. So I got a sample of this and having been incorporating it into my routine. My face has never looked better. Likeu2026.. I donu2019t even need to wear foundation AND my forehead lines (that I have made a Botox appointment for) are no longer bothering me. But $509 for a bottle is actually insane.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I jumped on the chance to get a sample of this product as a Beauty Insider reward but was totally unimpressed.  The product absorbs easily, doesn't have an unpleasant scent and didn't irritate my skin but that's all the positive review I can give.  For a product this expensive the results should be almost immediate and visible. I could find something similar in a grocery store beauty aisle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Is this serum nice? Yes. Is it worth hundreds of dollars? No, absolutely not. Iu2019m incredibly disappointed to see other reviewers using blatant fear mongering to shame other (typically less expensive) products and using their review to advertise other sources that do the same thing. No one needs a $495 CDN serum - if you think this serum is worth itu2026youu2019re easily fooled and thatu2019s nothing to boast about. If youu2019re happy to waste your money than by all means go ahead and buy this.

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s definitely a serum! lets stop exaggerating <3
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s just a regular serum. Itu2019s nothing special. Youu2019re paying for the brand name. But itu2019s pretty humorous to see people still fear mongering, pushing the false u201cclean beautyu201d agenda. Not to mention the shaming of ppl who can't afford a nearly $400 skincare product. You don't need this, smth like the inkey list is perfectly acceptable. Only pay this much if you WANT to, wanting high end products is completely relatable. but don't shame the ppl who can't or won't.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the AB cream so I was ready to switch over to their serum expecting even more improvement. I have to say - meh - which sucks given the price. It actually makes my pores appear larger! I will stick with my Barbara Sturm serums even though it means more steps. This is a return for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: AB is the only skincare I will use on my face. If the price scares you, the ingredients in other skincare brands should scare you more. First, AB uses ECOCERT/COSMOS certified glass. The fact is that even the purest skincare products can fall victim to chemicals leached from plastic containers, meaning that not only the skincare product, but harmful chemicals such as Biphisenol A are applied directly to the skin. Iu2019ll gladly pay more for glass. Second, AB uses safe and clean ingredients. Go ahead and download the Yuka app, pay the $8/year so you can search for products, then search for this serum. It rated 100/100 and is excellent quality. Then search for the serum youu2019re currently using, see where it stands next to this one. The sad thing is not even all u201ccleanu201d brands rank 100/100. And a lot of high end brands, such as La Mer, rank 0/100 and contain hazardous ingredients. The bottom line, with consistent use you will reap the benefits of using AB products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this free to review and I have to say its really not worth the price.  I loved the rich cream and was so excited to try this, but have not seen any noticeable difference in my skin. I'm 32 so I really don't have many wrinkles, but I do have some fine lines and there hasn't been any improvement.  It looks like they suggest to use this for 12 weeks, but I ran out of the product within a month.  It's not horrible, just not worth the high price IMO

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve literally switched out 85% of all skincare products to AB. I was skeptical of this because of the price, but omg. Itu2019s the third time Iu2019ve used this since purchasing and my skin feel so much more firm. I really wish Sephora carried refill options because I donu2019t see why I would need to repurchase a nomad? I am switching out my LaMer serum once finished and this will be my only, holy grail serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Meh. This product was nothing more than fine. It wasnu2019t particularly hydrating aside from what happens when you put a liquid on your face. People love to remark on how dewy something has made them but it is only because their skin is wet. Unless you have the funds and you are already a brand loyalistu2026 spend your money on something cheaper with less actives at a higher dose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so disappointed. I love the rich cream and had high hopes for the serum. Unfortunately it pills on my skin and soaks in so fast my skin doesnu2019t really feel all that hydrated. There are better options out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum absorbs so well; it made my skin look and feel hydrated, soft and smooth. I used the entire 1oz bottle in a month with daily use both day and night. I did miss a few days but was consistent for the most part.  I took before photos but theyu2019re not really worth sharing since unfortunately nothing changed. If youu2019re expecting life changing/miraculous results youu2019ll be disappointed. If you have the money to spend nearly $400 a month on a facial serum, Iu2019d say go for it. Or for the price of this product and better results, Iu2019d recommend a couple luxurious spa facials or Botox.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Augustinus Bader The Serum for a little over a month now and I like how soft it makes my skin feel and it gives a nice amount of hydration for my combination skin. I haven't seen any drastic change in my skin so I wouldn't pay the price for it, unless something in my skin changes by time I run out. I do love the packaging as it's very sturdy and has some weight to it. The dark blue and gold color really stand out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So first of all, this packaging. Itu2019s so big and bulky and fragile. I donu2019t understand the point of this giant glass container that holds the serum in it. It takes up a lot of space and doesnu2019t fit in my cabinet. As for the serum itself, itu2019s very lightweight and hydrating. It sits well under makeup. Feels light on the skin. Doesnu2019t feel sticky or anything. I have been using this for a month now and havenu2019t noticed any dramatic results but maybe it is too soon to tell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free for review.  This is the first Augustus Bader product I have ever tried. For the price tag, you get 1 oz in an airless pump that sits in an aluminum case which sits in a metal sleeve in a glass vase base. Fragile packing. The reason is that the product can be refilled. The product with the pump can be replaced for another one that sits inside the aluminum case. Kind of unnecessary.  I do like the airless pump. I used this every night on one side of my face after my actives and layered moisturizer on top for 4 weeks. It's supposed to do everything. Hydrate, plump, less wrinkles, less pigmentation, smooth, brighten. I do see a minor difference. Not drastic enough that one side of my face looks different than the other. But my before and after photos looks slightly better. A little bit smoother and less pigmentation.  The examples on the website are very slight as well. There's a lot of plant extracts and squalene as ingredients. Nothing in the ingredients look too revolutionary. It is unscented, spreads well, and lightweight. Per the website, it only lasts 2-3 months! It's nice to see a product that slightly works, but very few can afford to drop $350 every 3 months. I will definitely continue to use it, but will find it hard to recommend based on the price tag alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum feels great on your face. It's very hydrating and feels like it's doing something. Unfortunately, I didnt notice any difference. I really dont think this is worth the massive price tag

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: ABu2019s The Serum is a fantastic skincare product. Within three days of consecutive use, I noticed fine lines were less visible, though my deeper ones did not change that much. The serum itself is lightweight and one pump was sufficient to cover my whole face. With this product, I found that I didnu2019t need to use anything else besides a light moisturizer. The Serum also plays well with other products from different brands- I didnu2019t notice any adverse reactions. I would love to see how this works in conjunction with other AB products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is luxuriousssss! The packaging itself screams high end, top shelf skincare. Iu2019m somewhat familiar with this brand and none of their products have ever let me down. This specific product (the serum) is such a great quality. Iu2019ve noticed a difference within a week concerning fine lines Iu2019ve noticed forming and hydration. Thereu2019s no irritating scent at all and absorbs so well without the usual tacky feeling you might get after some serums. It is pricy for a very small size though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become a staple in my skincare routine. Itu2019s so light but effective. My skin feels very luxurious after using. My skin has seen the difference. I have never heard of this brand before and I am so glad I got the chance to try this out!

reviews.review_title: Was waiting for something magical to happenu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Letu2019s start this off by saying this price point is outrageous! $375 for a face serum! I wonder how much the actual serum is versus everything that you get with it. The packaging is a bit excessive. It is in a aluminum container, in a glass holder. You can take the piece out of the glass holder and repurpose it for makeup brushes or something. I did like that you can see where you are at in the container abs how much you have left.  u2022I did not notice this doing anything for me. I am half ways through my bottle and havenu2019t seen a change in my skin.  -For the price point, this didnu2019t seem any better than the $30 serums I have used.  There is a lot of science backed behind this but for me, I do not have the issues. It is supposed to help with skin hydration, hyperpigmentation, aging skin, and skin firmness. These are not concerns of mine so it is hard to give a review on them.  u2022Prosu2014no scent! Very lightweight and doesnu2019t leave a feeling on my skin. Not greasy at all. You donu2019t need a whole pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So this is a very interesting and innovative design but it is clunky, heavy, unstable, breakable and has way too little product in the bottle compared to the whole thing. My pump was a bit faulty and it had hard time getting out the product onto my fingers.  So there is no scent or fragrance to the serum and when you apply it onto your cleansed face it is not greasy and pretty light but it takes a significant amount of time to dry or absorb into your skin and then it forms this transparent film that after a while you can roll off your skin and just take it off almost like a tiny mask.  The quality of product I think is pretty good because I feel like there was improvement in my skinu2019s texture, it became smoother and softer and more hydrated. So it was noticeable for me personally.  Not sure if I would recommend this product that has so little of it plus barely stands upright without tilting over due to its design. So the design is definitely high end and luxurious but it is not practical. Iu2019d love to have this product in a more practical container. I wish it had a scent and dried quicker and without the film like residue. Iu2019ll keep using it but I doubt I will buy it in the future.  Thank You Influenster for letting me try it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wasnu2019t sure this was doing anything at firstu2026I liked the lightweight, non-greasy feel of it though, and it didnu2019t make me oilier than normal. It absorbs quickly, is unscented (a BIG plus in my book), didnu2019t aggravate my acne prone complexion, and seemed to plump the skin to give it a healthier look. All of these are good things, but for $375 and the major reputation of Augustinus Bader, I felt a little underwhelmed. A regular drug store serum could probably do the same?   After about 6 weeks of continued use once a day, I happen to go into my injectoru2019s office where they take makeupless u201cbeforeu201d photos at every single appointment. She pulled up a photo from last summer (pre serum use) and compared it to the current photo of me from that day. I WAS IN SHOCK. My new photo showed even, calm skin. It almost looked filtered/blurred. My significant, spotty melasma was almost completely gone. Acne marks? Gone. The tone was so even. I was looking at a photo of somebody with incredible skinu2026and it was me! Iu2019m so grateful I saw these photos and got such a confidence boost. Seeing is believing, and this serum isu2026magic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the consistency and feel of this product but unfortunately it made me break out with little reactive bumps all over my forehead and chin. Loved the luxurious packaging too. Sad I canu2019t use it though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not great, unscented, seems great for sensitive skin. Like it. For the price I might expect more results but overall itu2019s good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this. The bottle/packaging looks so luxurious, but I didnu2019t notice a difference in my skin, even after using it for several weeks. The formula is lightweight, non-sticky, and moisturizing which is great, but for the price point, I wanted to be wowed and just wasnu2019t quite sold on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First of all I need to say that the bottle itu2019s the so pretty. And than that After 3 weeks of use I could notice a little bit difference when Iu2019m talking about my fine lines, texture and elasticity.  The serum is zero scent ( my rhinitis thanks) and the consistency is like a mix of cream and liquid what makes the serum absorbs quickly into the skin.   Now talking about price x efficiency: I would recommend buying it only if you use other products of the same brand because I believe they work better together, otherwise I believe you can find good creams at more affordable prices and a better efficiency if use by itself. (  The 4 stars itu2019s about using just the serum from the brand, Iu2019m pressure if I use at least the gel cleaner from same brand Iu2019ll get better results! )

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lets start with the fact that I am obsessed with any product that is not scented - usually when you get a luxury brand they tend to blow you away with smell goods.  Why?!  This does not have a scent at all - it sinks into your skin almost immediately and it does not leave behind a tacky or filmy feeling that some serums can do.  With such a bougie price point the effectiveness is going to be in the limelight.  To help support its claims the serum has a lot of science that backs its performance.  Once you look at consumer thoughts so far there is a a varying with the majority of leaning on the happy side.  As for me - my skin did feel better after thirty days - I waited so long to write my review as I wanted to squeeze the last drop out prior to giving all of my thoughts - I wanted my review to encompass down the last drop - you knew I was going to add in some coffee humor!  My skin, without makeup, looked radiant, pores appeared smaller, there was a firmness in areas that were not as firm prior to using.  With that said, I do feel that there are other products on the AB line that share the same ingredients with a less expensive price point and/or other products in your fave skincare lines that are not as BOUGIE that would give the same results - I am about to start trying one out to see if there really does appear to be a better version for those of us that want to keep about $325 in our pocket book!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster to share my opinions on this new serum and I was pleasantly surprised because it is moisturizing and easy to include in my night routine. After 21 days, the skin of my neck and decolletage were loving it and it has been great for fine lines and firmness! Not sure about the price point but all in all loving the results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free to review for Influenster. I thought this product was great at first. Then my face started to breakout and I didn't notice a difference as far as my fine lines getting softer. Also this product is crazy expensive. I think there are better cheaper options out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a complimentary sample from Influenster. The price of this product is crazy! I don't feel like this made a different in my skin from what it's been. I will continue to use to see if I begin to see a difference after a couple of months. What I do love is the scent was barely there, very light weight product did not leave my face feeling or looking greasy at all! I'm not sure if I would spend this much on a face serum especially if I don't see a big difference. I neither loved or hated this product. I give it a 5/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been thrilled with this product and the results I have seen using it. I was dealing with a compromised moisture barrier and noticed the lines around my mouth deepening (oh no!) I decided to give my tretinoin a break and added this serum to my routine about a month ago. It is scent free and contains EIGHT antioxidants to help with battling free radical nonsense and aging. My face is feeling so much softer, I am currently breakout free, and those pesky lines have definitely softened. I CAN'T be 100% sure if it's this serum or the discontinuation of tret that has given my face back its UMPH, maybe a combinatiom of both? But it has not caused me any adverse effects and the ingredient lineup is wonderful. At the end of the day I would love to continue using this as a long term aid for anti-aging. I may have to make it my annual Birthday present though, from Hubby because the price is definitely out of my range for regular use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Formulated with clean super-hydrators and nature's most effective problem-solvers, this breakthrough serum zeros in on your skin's most persistent challenges.  From dehydration, stress, and the signs of aging and environmental damage to the appearance of imperfections and loss of elasticity, The Serum delivers an effortless, all-encompassing solution.  The Serum set includes a 100% recyclable glass base, and its refill / airless pump is housed in a 100% recyclable aluminum Nomad.  My experience:  The serum has a light, moisturizing milky texture.  The serum is absorbed instantly!  After absorption, there is no sticky or film-like feeling.  Moisturizes well, there were no rashes and clogged pores.  The skin remains moisturized until the evening, when applied under the eyes at night, no swelling or other troubles were noticed.  I use it after tonic before applying cream.  After applying it, the skin becomes like silk.  Indeed, the skin after the serum became smooth, toned, the complexion became fresh and healthy.  Expression lines are noticeably smaller.  The serum has an amazing effect on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has worked wonders on my face over the past 4-5 weeks. The dark spots have lightened, the fine lines have decreased, the firmness is noticeable. At first I thought, how could a product in packaging so beautiful be so effective? I was fooled, it works. I do have a suggestion. Cut down on the bulk of the beauty of packaging for a vegan product or create refills. If the company is promoting good things for the world we live in, I would want to see a 100% commitment about it!

reviews.review_title: Very gentle on the skin with good hydrating result
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster. The packaging is very high end.   I knew very little about the product when I received it, but could tell within a few weeks that my complexion was smoother. I also have a couple of dark spots on my face that have lightened.   It makes my pores appear less defined and seems to help lessen the wrinkles on my face as well.  The serum goes on easily and spreads well without needing very much.  The product feels very gentle on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked it! I gave it 4 stars because I feel like for $375 it should be life changing and it just wasn't. I definitely saw improvements in my complexion overall in the past month but I wouldn't spend that much just to get another bottle. If you have that kind of money go for it! The biggest change I saw was a more even skin tone. I also don't have wrinkles yet so I can't speak to how it works for fine lines or anything. I definitely think they're on to something with the formula though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to try for free from Influenster and Iu2019m so glad that I did. I used this daily for roughly a month and my skin has never looked better the redness on my face is now practically non existent and my skin has never felt as soft or looked bad hydrated. The packaging on it is stunning and when itu2019s empty Iu2019ll still leave it on my vanity for how good it looks. Itu2019s a little out of my normal budget for skin care but itu2019s a splurge Iu2019ll just have to make because it works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first received this serum I was so impressed with the packaging! It is nothing short of luxurious and looks amazing sitting on my bathroom counter. I was expecting nothing short of miracles to come from this serum but unfortunately I didnu2019t notice much of any change after a month of usage. I also thought it made my skin feel tighter and not very hydrated at all! I do have fair and overall dry skin so perhaps itu2019s better suited for people with different skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The presentation of this is stunning and looks great on my bathroom vanity. There are also a lot of pieces to it, so maybe that means there will be a refill unit to cost down on cost and waste. The product itself feels very nice on my skin and absorbed well without leaving a weird or greasy residue. I think after some extended use this will produce some great results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to receive this serum as it was my first time trying any Augustinus Bader products. This serum is fragrance free. Itu2019s lightweight and easy to apply. It spreads easily through your skin in upward motion. I have dry skin and this serum made my skin feel hydrating and non greasy. I did see a difference in my skin tone getting even. I would like to continue using it more for other visible results. It comes in nicely designed glass blue bottle. Definitely looking forward to other products this brand offers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know this is expensive and highend but honestly, you get every penny worth! Iu2019m very impressed, I have mild acne scars and some blemishes and within 2 weeks they all disappeared, Iu2019m so happy with the results! Itu2019s super worthy! Highly recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for almost a month now.  Consistency seems to be the key it makes my skin fell very hydrated and firm.  It goes on so smoothly and makes my skin so soft.  The packaging is as beautiful as the product.  I would recommend the product, if it is in your price range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product through influenster. I found the serum to work well. Moisturizing as well as minimized my pores. The reason for the 4 stars is that the packaging is way too over the top which obviously stretches the price point beyond most pocket books. Maybe sustainability should be considered.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this serum for the past 4 weeks and from first use I noticed the serum is milky and smooth. It does absorb into the skin well and feels soft once on the skin. I've noticed my lines have smoothed a bit and you don't need a lot to apply. I don't understand the packaging and actually find it unnecessary. Because of the structure it doesn't sit and stand on surfaces. It is pretty to look at but I could do without.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeous product packaging and amazing product! My skin feels supple and smooth and fully hydrated. I love the feel of this and itu2019s super lightweight. Would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: All I can say is WOW. This stuff is amazing. Iu2019ve been using it for about a month now and it has helped hydrate my skin so much! My skin can get really dry where I live in the fall so this came at the exact time I needed it and I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to give this serum a good chance so I've used it for a little over a month now, about five weeks.   I've found it to be moisturizing and gentle on my skin. It doesn't seem to have a scent which is good for skincare and has a nice texture that dries and doesn't leave you sticky. On mornings where I used this serum by itself the evening before my skin is really nice and soft. When I add this serum to my routine with some of my other skincare items like my Niacinamide lotion my skin was super soft and glowy, almost like it's happy. I can't say this worked miracles, I saw no change in any of my skin issues, and no help with any lines or skin texture in the long run, but if you don't expect miracles this is a very nice serum. After about five weeks of use (2 pumps covers my face and neck easily) it's still going strong but impossible to tell how much of the 1oz tube I've used because it's a heavy tube and not see through.  The packaging for this item is luxurious!! It's a metal tube but it sits in this beautiful blue glass canister that looks so gorgeous on your counter/vanity that people will definitely ask about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: But my skin loves it! The nice creamy liquid serum absorbs so quickly into my skin! I receved this free for review before it's release date, and in these 2 months I have seen my skin become more firm. Wish I would have taken pictures! The holder is beautiful and I leave it on my bathroom counter so I can use it immediately after showering in the morning and after washing my face at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The serum is inside a luxurious copper colored tube that slides inside a blue glass jar. I was impressed with the beautiful container.  I applied this serum after washing my face at night before the moisturizer.  The Serum absorbs into my skin quickly and makes my skin soft.  I have used this product for a month.  I noticed my sun-damaged hyperpigmentation spots and age lines were fading!  I will continue using this serum!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 6 week review - this stuff is absolutely amazing. I have been getting Botox and since receiving and using this daily alternating with my retinol I have been able to push out my Botox appointments as this is keeping my lines at bay. The price tag stings a lot however it is effective and worth it in my opinion. I did receive this for free but I will be repurchasing when I am out of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the serum with TFC8 technology! What a luxurious experience! The packaging itself is quite bougie. Comes with its own holder but there's always a method to the madness when it comes to #augustinusbader The TFC8 technology is something I've not experienced before. And I'm very grateful to be able to try it! But does it actually work?  The serum itself is super creamy if that makes sense. It absorbs very quickly into the skin! I've been using it for almost 3 weeks now, and I can see a difference in my skin! It's definitely firmer. And my laugh lines have diminished slightly. I'm excited to see more results with further use! You only need a little bit. Very easy to apply.  The only thing I can say that I'm a little bit disappointed in is the price. A 1 oz bottle as you see here in the picture will set you back $375 . I say if you have the money and you can spend it on this product, definitely go for it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Between the beautiful packaging to the serum inside, this give a truly luxurious experience to the user.  The serum glides onto the skin like silk and sinks in quickly without leaving and residue or tackiness behind.  I have noticed an improvement in my skin texture, reduction of redness and PIH, and an overall healthy glow. This serum works well with all of my other skin care products, both high end and drugstore.  The price is a bit steep.  I currently use one pump twice a day (morning and night) so I will have to see how long it lasts to tell if it would be cost effective to repurchase.  I am very happy with the results and will continue to use it until I finish my current tube.  I am glad to see that you can repurchase just the serum insert rather than the entire container as this helps to reduce waste. Overall a wonderful and effective serum from a trusted and reputable brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I got it in a vox box, and I couldnu2019t be more happy! Iu2019ve noticed my dark spots begin to fade and I recommend this serum! I will def re-purchase when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rated this a 3 because of the price. Itu2019s outrageous!  I donu2019t think itu2019s any better than other serums  Iu2019ve used. Meh overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: -No scent -Creamy watery serum -Absorbs super quickly under 30 seconds, my skin just drinks this stuff up. It gives me a great dose of moisture, I donu2019t even need an added moisturizer in the mornings.  -Packaging is truly stunning, a little over the top tbh -Iu2019ve had a scarred pore in the middle of my forehead from a horrible facial about 4 or 5 years ago. Nothing has made an ounce of difference until this product. Itu2019s now so much less noticeable  -My pores seem smaller/less exaggerated looking. -The overall texture of my skin has gotten so much better and smoother.  -Took one star off because unfortunately it has not made any difference at all in my rosacea.

reviews.review_title: Love the product; packaging is too much!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love AB products even though they are so expensive! I really like how my skin looks and feels immediately afterwards and with continued use, but donu2019t fully understand the over-the-top and wastefulu2014but fully recyclable, yet still unnecessaryu2014packaging. This is a great product that I can see real results with, but I canu2019t help but feel like the packaging cost was part of the reason this has such a high price point. I really like AB products and think that even though results are science backed and only quality ingredients are used, the price point is still unrealistic for most consumers. Moreover, think the fancy packaging takes away from quality of the product itself. If itu2019s effective, which it is, it doesnu2019t need all the packing u201cfluffu201d. AB- offer mini sizes in all your products so that people can try without paying so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will start off by saying the packaging is interesting. It is very high quality & heavy. I'm not sure why they chose to package it this way, it reminds me of a vial. Overall, I see no difference in my skin after using this product. I definitely did not notice hydration but the opposite & I'm not someone who is prone to dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't want to love this serum as much as I did bc that price tag is exorbitant! The truth is I saw results within days. My skin looked brighter and was hydrated. The packaging is gorgeous and I'll be curious to see the price of the refill. I'm not sure I can afford to repurchase but I really want to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall this product is a 5/5 but this price?!u2026Is a 1/5 lol. This product does exactly what  it says; targets dehydration, dryness and visibly firms. Iu2019ve been using this product 3-4x a week for about a month and itu2019s been lovely!  My skin feels soooo bouncy, supple, and soft. It almost looks like I have a filter on; let me also add that i use exfoliants but this product has elevated my skincare routine.   This product does not contain fragrance but has a slightly faint medicinal scent; the scent does not bother me nor does it last long just thought to call that out.   The amount of product that you get for this price is unjust. The packaging is BEAUTIFUL and HUGE so when I received it, I thought there was at least 4oz to work with- instead the 1oz vial sits in a vessel. I understand thatu2019s to help the vial stand u2026 and could probably be repurposedu2026but AB couldu2019ve made the serum itself with a flat bottom. It makes me wonder if this almost $400 price tag is for the packaging and packaging alone.   Overall, if you love AB products Iu2019m sure this is in your wheelhouse, I recommend purchasing. If youu2019re looking to splurge, I recommend purchasing. You donu2019t absolutely need this product but itu2019s nice to have! Am I currently contemplating spending my own money for this? Yes, yes I am. And will more than likely close my eyes and make that purchase when the time comes because I feel like it has completed my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is simply fantastic! The packaging and amazing! The design is incredible. I have been using this product since 2 weeks in the morning and night. My skin is more bright. The change has been my morning.. after few days I already saw the difference! I will buy for sure this product and suggest to all my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: #I got it complimentary from#insfluenster I have used this product like everyday. And it works for the time being or or few hours of used. I saw a difference on my y skin but not to the point that it get rid of big pores, fine lines and white heads of my face. Its absorbs nicely on the skin, not runny not thick it's balanced. It's not oily or anything it's a good product overall. Will I recommend it? In my personal opinion,with its price, I expect it to be the best of the best but it's not. Will I buy it personally? Probably not, it's too pricey for what it offers and effectivenes! Packaging is cute and luxurious but I prefer what's inside than what it looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging for this is insane! Very over the top but beautiful. Once you look it over you realize it is basically a serum in a pump dispenser, housed in a sort of vase. the serum is very light and you just need a little bit for each use so it can last a long time. I feel like the main purpose of this product is to plump and hydrate which it seems to do well, and also plays well with my other skin care products. This seems to anti-age by gently easing wrinkles with hydration. I would apply this first and still put things like sunblock and eye cream over the top after without issues like pilling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this serum from last one month in the morning and night before my bed. I have seen drastic skin improvement in my skin. To be honest at first impression i was  amazed to see my skin one week . I had some very stressful work and my skin was showing up all the age symptoms and extra dryness . I started living my skin back. Even i see great improvement in my freckles-and  pores too. My skin look healthy and has glow in it. I got it as a sample from Influenster but after looking at price on Sephora i feel like its little on pricier side but with looking at my skin impressions i will save money for those days when skin shows all symptoms and doesn't work your way. This serum works wonder and makes your skin glowy and fresh.

The Serum is light weight and absorbed quickly into my skin. After immediate use, my skin felt moisturized and supple, but soon, my skin returned to its normal condition. With repeated use, unfortunately  I have yet to see any lasting results from the serum. Lastly the serum is beautifully packaged, easy to use/disperse, and comes nestled in a gorgeous blue holder, it is aesthetically pleasing.

reviews.review_title: Thank you for what you do!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So if you are looking for a great product to improve the quality of your skin, then you have found it. I have been using it now for a month and I will say at first it just felt like another serum, but I gave it a faithful try and it is 100% improved. My skin is visibly brighter and more smooth. I will be a true believer in this product line from here on out. Sometimes you get what you pay for, and if you want results go with the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited when I received this product to try from Influenster. It comes beautifully packaged and feels so luxurious on my skin. I have used this twice a day for 4 weeks and have noticed a difference in my skin and my fine lines. At 58 I am always trying new serums for anti aging, and this one is just amazing!

reviews.review_title: MultiUse product. Didn't inflame pimple! Soft skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So happy I've gotten a chance to try this product! I've tried La mer, Dr. Barbara Sturm, Amore Pacific, and 111 skin, so am not new to luxury brands. This product was a fast-absorbing contentrate formulated, it was not sticky after application (hate when that's the case), it was technically unscented(like Dr. Sturm), which is always recommended for your skin but does have the lightest formula smell to it. My face does for sure feels soft and I was nervous putting it on with my breakout would inflame my pimple, as other products have, but it did not cause irriation to my pimple. For me, 1 pump was plenty of product. The product was 1 oz, so the holder is a little bigger that the actual product, and since it's a metallic structure, you can also make it cold and place the bottle on your face to reduce puffiness. Lastly, the holder is made of recycled material and can be used as a small weighted vase or a brush holder. pretty cool!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum definitely has my heart for itu2019s stunning packaging and bottle . I was very excited when I received it . I love the application on my skin , which gives a soothing feeling and shine as I apply. I still would mention I have a habit of touching my face and this serum comes off as powder after sometime . This never happened with other serums and thatu2019s upsetting and I had to reapply . After using for nearly a month havenu2019t found noticeable changes .

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this serum more than a month ago. So I had enough time to taste it. Let me start from the packaging. Itu2019s a next level! It looks so different and so thoughtful. Itu2019s not only beautiful but also functional. I like that product comes in a tube with pump. it is hygienic and economical. Serum is almost without any aroma. It has pleasant texture. Serum absorbs very fast and doesnu2019t leave sticky residue on skin. It is really moisturizing and made my pores smaller. I can recommend this product for everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am one of the, fortunate to have received this magnificent Product, This Serum at its best, during the time that I have used it I have felt a very remarkable hydration and I feel a Softness, Shine more life on my Face, it is the best, in the I also apply neck is the best, Love your Packaging is luxury, very elegant, Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg wow this ultra luxurious AB serum literally gives your face the feeling that it just won the lottery! First of all, this packaging is incredible. Quite a splurge but This is seriously the Ferrari of skin care. Light, hydrating, this silky serum is a staple for in your skincare routine. I canu2019t get over the packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, the packaging is stunning. It looks expensive, which I appreciate because it is. Itu2019s silky and sinks in to your skin quickly. Personally, I didnu2019t notice a change but maybe itu2019s just not the product for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is beautiful, for the price point it makes it look so lux. Iu2019ve been using the serum for a few weeks and itu2019s hydrating and makes your skin so soft, I also love itu2019s not scented and doesnu2019t mess with my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the container it comes and actually repurposed it as a vase. The serum itself Is wonderful it doesnu2019t have a strong perfume scent which is best for my skin. Iu2019ve noticed smoother skin as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum works wonders on my skin. After a few days of use, my skin felt noticeably firmer and softer.  My skin also looked smoother, healthier, and much more hydrated. The packaging is so luxe! Although Augustinus Baderu2019s products are more expensive than many other beauty products on the market, this serum is worth the higher price tag and is the best serum Iu2019ve tried so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight, easy to absorb but provides immense hydration. I use it every morning and night - I can feel my skin getting softer and clearer.

reviews.review_title: It makes me feel alot more high class than I am.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First things first..  this packaging made me feel like part of the 1%. I opened the box and felt like if been transported to Victoria Beckhams bathroom. It makes my bathroom look nicer just sitting on the counter. I'll keep it there forever, I even bought a shower curtain to match it lol. Now the product itself-a little goes a long way-as it should for that price. The first morning after my first use I immediately noticed a difference. My fine lines looked more plump and less visible. My skin tone looked more even which is great for me because I never have time for foundation. All in all if say it's a wonderful product. Now I've never tried a $300-400 serum before so as far as price point goes I have absolutely nothing to compare it to, but I suppose it's true what they say...you get what you pay for.  Use his card and splurge sis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing product, slowly seeing the result, I've noticed my skin became more enegized and hydrated, definitely looking healthier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is amazing. My skin is smoother, more even toned, my pores have shrunk, acne has significantly decreased and fine lines and wrinkles aren't even visible anymore. A little pump goes a long way. It doesn't leave my skin oily like other serums, but instead leaves it nice and moisturized.  I've had people compliment on how my skin looks since I've started using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so pretty, the packaging is incredible and looks super luxurious. However, I feel that it is over the top and super heavy while the product inside the blue glass is a fraction of it. It works amazing though, it is hydrating and feel great on my skin. When I use it, I feel like a million bucks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying Augustinus Bader can do no wrong since I had not even opened the product and the casing that it came in impressed me right off the bat- absolutely gorgeous and perfect to display on your vanity ( a few of my friends even asked what it was since they were intrigued with the packaging).   I started using this product 3 weeks ago and immediately after the first application I noticed a difference in my skinu2019s overall texture and suppleness. This serum is like a drink for my skin and my fine lines seem to disappear right after application. No other product that Iu2019ve tried has done this for my skin (not even La Mer!) Within 3 weeks, my skin had visibly decreased fine lines and looked healthier and brighter! I absolutely love using this serum since it doesnu2019t have that sticky feeling after application. My skin feels smoother and refreshed and is now a staple in my pre bed routine. You need this in your life if you want to get rid of those pesky fine lines!
